/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their red brick facades adding a touch of traditional architecture to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the city.
